verses.verse: Loved ones, I am already writing this second letter to you in which I am waking up your genuine mind in a quiet reminder
to remember the statements stated before by the sacred preachers and the demand from our missionaries of the Master and Rescuer.
Knowing this first, that over the last days, mockers will come traveling in line with their own desires
and saying, "Where is the promise of His arrival? You see, since the day that the fathers fell asleep, all things through it all stay like this from the beginning of creation;"
for this is unnoticed by them (since they want it to be unnoticed): that there were skies from a long time ago and land that had stood together from water and through water with the message of God,
through which, the world at that time was ruined when it was flooded with water.
The skies now and the land that have been saved up with the same message are kept for fire in a day of judgment and ruin of the godless people.
This one thing must not be unnoticed by you, loved ones: that one day beside the Master is as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.
The Master of the promise is not slow as some regard slowness, but He is patient to us, not intending for anyone to be ruined, but for all people to make room for a change of ways.
The Master's day will arrive as a thief in the night, in which the skies will pass with a loud crash. Primary elements being on fire will be undone, and land and the actions in it will be burned up.
So since all these things are being undone, what kind of people is it necessary for you to be in sacred behaviors and expressions of godliness,
expecting and hurrying the arrival of the day of God, because of which, flaming skies will be undone, and primary elements being on fire are melted?
But we expect new skies and new land (according to His promise) in which the right way resides.
For this reason, loved ones, as you expect these things, make every effort to be found by Him in peace, unspotted and unblamed people.
And regard the patience of our Master as a rescue, just as our loved brother Paul in line with the insight given to him also wrote to you,

as also in all the letters, speaking in them about these things, in which there are some hard to understand things that the unlearned and unestablished pervert (as also the rest of the writings) to their own ruin.
So you, loved ones, since you know these things beforehand, beware that, after being led away together with the misleading lie of the noncompliant, you don't fall from your own established position.
But grow in generosity and information about our Master and Rescuer Jesus, the Anointed King. To Him belongs the magnificence both now and for a day of a span of time. Amen.
